We empower women to

Design & Solve Design & Solve Design & Solve

#Tech4Policy empowers young women to design digital solutions to governance and democratization challenges in Kosovo’s municipalities.

EXPLORE HOW

About Tech4Policy


Problem diagnosis

We work with municipalities and local communities to identify the burning problems they face day in day out.


Digital problem-solving

We create a supportive environment for catalyzation of innovative solutions that leverage modern technologies for contributing to social good.


Skill development and product design

We equip young women with the necessary skills to design real-world digital solutions to local governance challenges.

Where do we work?

Our Municipal Partners

Through close engagement with citizens and local leaders, Tech4Policy strives to improve governance in Kosovo’s municipalities all while boosting employability of young women in the high-potential ICT sector.
Over two years, Tech4Policy will work with 10 municipalities and engage 250 young women across Kosovo in digital product development that will serve its citizens and contribute to social wellbeing.

Municipalities

In the first year of the project implementation, we are verythrilled to work with the municipalities of:
- 1 - GJAKOVA
- 2 - FERIZAJ
- 3 - PRIZREN
- 4 - DRENAS

Activities

Municipal Working Sessions

Working with officials on identifying gaps in local governance.

Community Consultations

Listening to the needs of citizens.

Trainings

Equipping young women-coders with digital product development skills.

Prototyping Digital Solutions

Engaging participants in hands-on problem-solving.

Incubation

Supporting and full development of winning digital solutions.

Product Delivery

Delivering digital products to municipalities.

Project is implemented by:

Girls Coding Kosova and Open Data Kosovo

GIRLS CODING KOSOVA

Will provide technical support as well as access to their network of young women in technology. In order promote a multidisciplinary approach to problem-solving, selected GCK members will serve as tech ambassadors disseminating concepts of how citizens involved in different sectors can benefit from and contribute to technology for social good.

OPEN DATA KOSOVO

Will contribute technical expertise in the field of software engineering as well as in digital product development management and quality assurance. Furthermore, it will use its experience in organizing and implement youth engagement digital capacity building workshops to design the planned workshops and ensure their proper execution.

This project is funded by European Union Office in Kosovo.

Stay In Touch & Say Hello.

If you have questions for us, you can use the form below or you can contact us directly at: hello@girlscodingkosova.org or info@opendatakosovo.org
